title: CreateILTSessions
introduction: In this guide, weâ€™ll show you how to create a new ILT session. A session is a scheduled instance of an event.

steps.title: Access ILT Events & Sessions Page
steps.details:
1. Click the menu icon.
  2. Under the Content Management dropdown, select Manage Events & Sessions.
  3. The Event search page will open.

steps.title: Select the event
steps.details:
1. Simply enter a key word or the name of the Event in the Event Name text box.
  2. Select the Search button. Top results will populate below.
  3. Click the View Sessions link for the desired Event.

steps.title: Create a new Session
steps.details: 1. Click the Create New Fairview Health Services Session button.

hotspots.title: Scheduled Sessions
hotspots.description: All scheduled Sessions for this Event will populate here.

steps.title: Enter Part Details
steps.details:
1. Click Location Field expand icon.
  2. Search for the desired classroom by name and click add towards the right of the screen.
  3. Click Done.
  4. Fill in the correct Start Date, End Date, Start Time and End Time.
  5. If this is a multi-day session, click the Save & Add New Part button in the bottom right of the screen. You will need to complete the previous steps for each of the additional days.
  6. When the information has been filled out for the last part of the session, click the Save Part button to review.

hotspots.title: Save & Add New Part
hotspots.description: This is only needed for multi-day sessions. You will need to click this button for each day of the multi-day session.

hotspots.title: Save Part
hotspots.description: Click this button if it is a single day session or all of the parts of the multi-day session have been filled out.

steps.title: Review Parts
steps.details:
1. Review the details filled out for the previous step on this screen.
  2. Click the Check Conflicts button.
  3. If the Status circle for the part is yellow or red, that means this classroom may already be scheduled for another event or session. 
  4. Edit the part if needed.
  5. Click Next to continue.

steps.title: Enter Session Details
steps.details:
1. The Details page should already have all of the presets in place from the Event Template.
  2. Review the information and change as needed.
  3. Scroll all the way down and select the Next button when finished.

steps.title: Enter Session Availability
steps.details:
1. Here you will select who you want the Session to be available for.
  2. Most Sessions will be available to all users.
  3. Select All Users from the Select Criteria dropdown.
  4. Click the Add button next to the dropdown.
  5. If this session needs to be limited to a specific audience, reach out to the LMS team for assistance.
  6. Click Next when finished.

steps.title: Select Email Option
steps.details:
1. Here you have the option to send out emails to learners who enroll in the Session.
  2. Select between a System Default Email, Custom Email, or No Email.
  3. If you would like a Custom Email created fro your session, reach out to the LMS team.
  4. Click Next.

steps.title: Create the Session
steps.details:
1. Review all settings and options you have selected for this session.
  2. When finished, scroll all the way down and select the Save button.
